== Quick Start ==

Download the source code and run the script main.m.

You will need Matlab R2008a or later, the Image Processing Toolbox, and the Genetic Algorithm and Direct Search (GADS) toolbox.  

== Next Steps ==

The framework does not do much with the default components.  A few additional component examples are included in the source, and can be selected by editing frameworkConfig.m.  In addition, you can [http://code.google.com/p/functionalnavigation/downloads/list download components] created by others to demonstrate more system configurations.

Note that some components may rely on licensed Matlab toolboxes.
